intro.description: Tests for the index view. These tests require org.eclispe.ua.tests to be installed.

item.title: Test Index View
item.description: Run some tests on the index view in the webapp.

subitem.label: Verify that there’s an index tab at the bottom left. Click on it to open the index.
Verify that there is a text box with a DISPLAY button to the right and that there is a list of keywords.

item.title: Index view order
item.description: Tests for the ordering of keywords in index view

subitem.label: Verify that _keyword, -keyword, +keyword and =keyword appear at the front of the index, before any keywords that start with letters.
Verify that xaa, Xyx and xyz appear in that order.
Verify that action, ámbito and assistance appear in that order.

item.title: Typein
item.description: Verify that the typein advances the index

subitem.label: Type "x" into the typein area. Verify that xaa is at the top of the screen.
Type "y" after the "x" (making xy). Verify that Xyx is at the head of the list.

item.title: Navigate to content
item.description: Click on "keyword1", verify that topic1 opens.

item.title: Test Index in Help View
item.description: Repeat the tests using the help view

subitem.label: Verify that there’s a hyperlink titled index at the top. Click on it to open the index.led index at teh top. Click on it to open the index.
Verify that there is a text box with a DISPLAY button to the right and that there is a list of keywords.

item.title: Help view order
item.description: Tests for the ordering of keywords in help view

subitem.label: Verify that _keyword, -keyword, +keyword and =keyword appear at the front of the index, before any keywords that start with letters.
Verify that xaa, Xyx and xyz appear in that order.
Verify that action, ámbito and assistance appear in that order.

item.title: Help view Typein
item.description: Verify that the typein selects the correct item

subitem.label: Type "x" into the typein area. Verify that xaa is highlighted.
Type "y" after the "x" (making xy). Verify that Xyx is highlighted.

item.title: Help view Navigate to content
item.description: Click on "keyword1", verify that topic1 opens.
